refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns if the specified mode outputs blocks or not

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
mode
The mode to check.
lib_dir
The optional lib_dir parameter can contain the location of where the algorithm module is on the system.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
This function returns &true; if the mode outputs blocks of bytes or &false; if it outputs just bytes. (e.g. &true; for cbc and ecb, and &false; for cfb and stream).
